title: Ubuntu versions
body: It was mentioned in the preview video that the release version of Ubuntu on windows will go to 16.04. Will there be a way of staying on 14.04 LTS (with appropriate patches) and selecting 14.04 instead of 16.04 on new installations?

comments.body: @Anonymous that would be fixed when you can install dristos from the Microsoft Store. You will be able to install any distro manually thanks to App sideloading.
Any update about the option to use 14.04 instead off 16.04?
